item.title: CVE-2023-2673|2023-08-25T05:48:41.651Z -- phoenix%20contact -- fl%20mguard%202102
item.description: Improper Input Validation vulnerability in PHOENIX CONTACT FL/TC MGUARD Family in multiple versions may allowÂ UDP packets to bypass the filter rules and access the solely connected device behind the MGUARD which can be used for flooding attacks.
